title: Virtual Collection Registry (VCR)
content: Virtual Collection Registry (VCR) This presentation shows how to create a citable collection of language resources with the CLARIN Virtual Collection Registry . A virtual collection is a coherent set of links to digital objects (e.g. annotated text, video) that can be easily created, accessed and cited. The links can originate from different archives.
